formType.description: Describers whether the Form is composed of Content or Items.

formUUID.description: The unique technical identifier for the Form

description.description: The extended description for the form

predecessor.description: Represents a predecessor form that this form was copied / created from. This is to track and manage history of form change over time.

content.description: The externally source content of the form. This is only populated when the formType is Content

status.description: Indicates the status of the entity. A form may only be set to status Deleted if it has never been used. Setting a form to Deleted will cascade the deletion to all FormItems, FormConditions, and FormRules. No un-deletion is available for Forms.

formMode.description: Detail Forms are only used for showing read-only data related to other entities. Update forms represent capture of data, such as an Inspection Script or Safety Form.
